summary: In Chapter 17, titled “Breaking the Cycle,” Caleb Langtry confronts the oppressive atmosphere of the building where he and other residents are trapped in monotonous routines. Feeling a growing urgency, he gathers the residents to share his plan to escape this confinement and engaged them with a sense of hope. As they explore a newly discovered passage from the basement, the building resists their efforts with violent tremors, yet they unite in a chant to channel their collective will for freedom.
